author: amassari
msg: If the option /Zc:wchar_t is specified, map XMLCh to wchar_t, or trying to use wide-char Windows API will generate compiler errors (jira# 413)

author: amassari
msg: - Removed warning about exception classes having a base class with a protected copy constructor (jira# 1323)
- Added placement new and delete to allow XMemory-derived classes to be hosted in STL containers
